name: Merge
semantic_context: Merges data of multiple streams once data from both is available
natural_language_description: 这是 Merge 节点。主要用于: Merges data of multiple streams once data from both is available

oldVersionNotice.displayName: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.
oldVersionNotice.name: oldVersionNotice
oldVersionNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.

mode.name: mode
mode.description: How data of branches should be merged
mode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Mode | 作用: How data of branches should be merged | 默认值: append
available_options: Append (值: append) - Combines data of both inputs. The output will contain items of input 1 and input 2.
Keep Key Matches (值: keepKeyMatches) - Keeps data of input 1 if it does find a match with data of input 2

Merge By Index (值: mergeByIndex) - Merges data of both inputs. The output will contain items of input 1 merged with data of input 2. Merge happens depending on the index of the items. So first item of input 1 will be merged with first item of input 2 and so on.
Merge By Key (值: mergeByKey) - Merges data of both inputs. The output will contain items of input 1 merged with data of input 2. Merge happens depending on a defined key.
Multiplex (值: multiplex) - Merges each value of one input with each value of the other input. The output will contain (m * n) items where (m) and (n) are lengths of the inputs.
Pass-Through (值: passThrough) - Passes through data of one input. The output will contain only items of the defined input.
Remove Key Matches (值: removeKeyMatches) - Keeps data of input 1 if it does NOT find match with data of input 2

Wait (值: wait) - Waits till data of both inputs is available and will then output a single empty item. Source Nodes must connect to both Input 1 and 2. This node only supports 2 Sources, if you need more Sources, connect multiple Merge nodes in series. This node will not output any data.

join.name: join
join.description: How many items the output will contain if inputs contain different amount of items
join.natural_language_description: 参数名: Join | 作用: How many items the output will contain if inputs contain different amount of items | 默认值: left
available_options: Inner Join (值: inner) - Merges as many items as both inputs contain. (Example: Input1 = 5 items, Input2 = 3 items | Output will contain 3 items).
Left Join (值: left) - Merges as many items as first input contains. (Example: Input1 = 3 items, Input2 = 5 items | Output will contain 3 items).
Outer Join (值: outer) - Merges as many items as input contains with most items. (Example: Input1 = 3 items, Input2 = 5 items | Output will contain 5 items).

propertyName1.name: propertyName1
propertyName1.description: Name of property which decides which items to merge of input 1
propertyName1.natural_language_description: 参数名: Property Input 1 | 作用: Name of property which decides which items to merge of input 1 | 提示: The name of the field as text (e.g. “id”) | (必填项)

propertyName2.name: propertyName2
propertyName2.description: Name of property which decides which items to merge of input 2
propertyName2.natural_language_description: 参数名: Property Input 2 | 作用: Name of property which decides which items to merge of input 2 | 提示: The name of the field as text (e.g. “id”) | (必填项)

output.name: output
output.description: Defines of which input the data should be used as output of node
output.natural_language_description: 参数名: Output Data | 作用: Defines of which input the data should be used as output of node | 默认值: input1

overwrite.name: overwrite
overwrite.description: Select when to overwrite the values from Input1 with values from Input 2
overwrite.natural_language_description: 参数名: Overwrite | 作用: Select when to overwrite the values from Input1 with values from Input 2 | 默认值: always
available_options: If Blank (值: blank) - Overwrites only values of "null", "undefined" or empty string
If Missing (值: undefined) - Only adds values which do not exist yet
